data.text:
When Harold Leo Lloyd was born on 20 July 1908, in King, Washington, United States, his father, Harold Leo Lloyd, was 32 and his mother, Alice Elizabeth Moffitt, was 24. He married Mary Luella Muster in Franklin, Ohio, United States. They were the parents of at least 1 son. He lived in Randolph, Portage, Ohio, United States in 1910. He died on 16 February 1972, in Marlboro, Stark, Ohio, United States, at the age of 63, and was buried in Marlboro, Stark, Ohio, United States.
